reviews.text: Staff were unfriendly and even rude. Bar was meant to be open til 11pm and was closed at 10pm meaning no other options for soft drinks. Food in restaurant was so basic and mostly cold. Mattress in room was terrible and needed replacing as we could feel springs through. And tripping hazards in the morning with laundry in corridors!!! Only nice thing we can say it was a clean hotel mostly and in a reasonable location to city centre.

The room was nice and clean, very pleasant, the only downside was the walls are very thin and you can hear people in the next room chatting away and also the room was very hot, we couldn't really have the window open as it was on street level and anyone could have come in through the window while we were sleeping.

We were told there would be SKA event on that night until 1am, but that was ok as we were told in advance.

Staff were very nice and pleasant too.
The location was a bit too far from the centre, but otherwise it was a great stay for the money.
We would stay again.  The rooms are a bit tired but clean and comfortable bed.  Not too bad price either.   Only 10mins walk from trendy Digbeth so good location.
Lovely stay at this hotel. Really friendly staff, comfortable room and nice food. Not too far from city centre and dog friendly

Everything is fine, staff were good on arrival, barman was cool, bar woman was cool, the breakfast was great everything was ok, stayed on top floor everything ok with room really comfy, couldn't hear any noise, only thing disappointing was England lost, amd the location if the pub was somewhere else it would be better place to stay but would happily come back here. All staff were amazing will happy say which room we stayed at do you know who has wrote this
